Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Elm
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted NB: Dearborn, Division and Clark; SB: Clark, Division, Walton and Clark due to, street blockage near Clark/Elm.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Clark/Elm.

Northbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Division and Clark

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Division, Walton and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Westbound Reroute near Clark/Elm
ShortDescription: Westbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Walton, Clark, Chicago, LaSalle and Division due to, street blockage near Clark/Elm.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Walton, Clark, Chicago, LaSalle and Division due to, street blockage near Clark/Elm.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
